name: Alien Sushi Club
description:
A Rhythm game Play via your mouse (and keybroad)!

If you can't hear sound try to scroll your mouse wheel up to increase volume or adjuct it in setting page.

How to play:

Select a song and "Green Guy" will follow your mouse, aliens will coming in the front, you just need to point at the road and feed them Sushi on the beat and you got point!

You can install any song that create for Osu!

Sorry don't have time to write more detail in description, I'll add it later.
